'''{{PAGENAME}}''' is a [[Pillars of Eternity II: Deadfire world map|location]] in {{poe2}}.

==Background==
Built into a permanently moored ship, the Treasure Trove is a shop belonging to Dimesa and selling goods of... Questionable provenance.

==Points of interest==
* A small location. Dimesa's where the captain's cabin would be, with the hold holding various... Worthless objects. Her real offer is a lot more worthwhile, though.

==Characters==
* [[Dimesa]]

==Loot==
* [[Sun and Moon]], [[Squid's Grasp]], [[Rekvu's Stained Grasps]], [[Mirrorback]], [[Voidward]], [[Iridescent Scale]]: Sold by Dimesa.
{{DEFAULTSORT:Treasure Trove, The}}
title: The Treasure Trove
